section.title: List punctuation
section.p: Do not use ; to end list items (this is an old-fashioned approach that is not used in modern English). If each list item is a sentence, end it with a period. If each item is a sentence fragment, don't add any punctuation. Make sure all the items in the list are either sentences or fragments. Don't mix sentences and fragments in a list. Always use the same punctuation for every item in a list.

section.title: Avoid ending a list item with semi-column

dlentry.dd: List items should not end with a semi-column (;). If it is a sentence then end it with a full stop (.), otherwise leave it without an ending character.
